sen.e: The incident started when a lecture, "Tolstoy's view on penal law through his novel, Resurrection" in October 1932 by Professor Yukitoki TAKIGAWA of the Faculty of Law, Kyoto Imperial University explained in his talk that "Criminal offenses occur when organization of the national governmental is bad", which was considered problematic by the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Law as being anarchist.
